A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Could have been better written
You need gravity for bombs to drop out of ships
Gravity does not cause laser cannon bolts to arc towards Cruisers
Any Admiral could have ordered the Resistance ships back
Four separate space-ships do not run out of fuel in an 18 hour time-span
Luke could have materialized at any point\, but allows 90% of the resistance to die before doing so...
...and finally\,
Chewie should have bitten down... it was already cooked and he was hungry
